sub_topic: Calculating the circumference of a circle.
message_1: A circular pizza has a radius of 10 inches. What is the circumference of the pizza?
message_2:
The circumference of a circle is given by the formula C = 2πr, where C is the circumference and r is the radius of the circle. In this case, the radius of the pizza is 10 inches. 

So, the circumference of the pizza is:

C = 2π(10) = 20π ≈ 62.83 inches
